content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill has no fuel, stone furnace has no fuel

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Stone furnace at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0) 
-  Stone furnace has no ingredients

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of 
-  Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
-  Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0) 
-  Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5) 
-  Pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)
-  Electricity group (position x=114.5 y=-28.666666666666668)
-  Boiler has no fuel, steam engine is not connected, electricity group is not plugged into electric network

### Transport belt system at position(x=40.5 y=-83.5)
Consists of 
-  Belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)
-  Belt group is empty, transport belts are working

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities have no fuel
-  Ensure that burner mining drills and boilers have fuel to function properly
### Errors when entities have no ingredients
-  Ensure that stone furnaces have ingredients to function properly
### Errors when entities are not connected
-  Ensure that steam engines are connected to the electricity network to function properly
### Errors when entities are not plugged into electric network
-  Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into the electric network to function properly
### Errors when belt groups are empty
-  Ensure that belt groups have items to transport to function properly

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined or invoked. 
No important variables have been assigned.
